<title level="1" right="Trait">[Boggard](/Traits.aspx?ID=209)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 345</row>

Boggards are frog-like humanoids. They typically have darkvision.
name: Boggard
